text: "When I Need You" is a 1977 song by English Australian singer Leo Sayer and taken from his 1976 album Endless Flight. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, United States, Ireland and Canada. ==References== Category:1977 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Leo Sayer songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Celine Dion songs Category:Cliff Richard songs
